description: TYPO3 v11 Composer Installation with Custom Web Directory - Extensions ONLY in vendor directory

news.reason: Should not find georgringer/news in vendor directory

powermail.reason: Should not find in2code/powermail or example/powermail in vendor directory

custom_tools.reason: Should find in web/typo3conf/ext directory (TYPO3 v11 Composer allows extensions in typo3conf/ext)

site_package.reason: Should find in web/typo3conf/ext directory (TYPO3 v11 Composer allows extensions in typo3conf/ext)

notes: TYPO3 v11 Composer installation with custom web-dir 'web'
For TYPO3 v11, extensions can be NOT be found in vendor directory
TYPO3 v11 Composer mode still allows extensions in typo3conf/ext directory
Only TYPO3 v12+ enforces vendor-directory-only for Composer mode
